title: SPI - Shopping.io data, A selling point.
body:
Ever heard of the tech giants selling your online behavior data for big money? Do you ever get anything out of it? If no, here is your chance

Summary: Partner with an oracle to sell buyer behavior data on the platform and distribute the income amongst SPI holders

Details:
1. Setup a partnership with an Oracle - API3, Chainlink etc
2. Store and share data at a rolled up (never individual) level with the oracle provider. The following are examples
    Facts: Dollar sales, number of orders, crypto spent
    Dimensions: Sales category, crypto used, shipping region or zip, SPI holding (for market segment sense) or VIP vs non VIP, other parameters
3. Share data with Oracle at a preset price and have third party pay in tokens
4. Convert tokens to SPI and distribute amongst stakers
     Note: while ideal to distribute 100% after transaction costs, one consideration is to allow putting 10 to 20% back into business for things like exchange listing, celebrity marketing
choices: Sell the data - Make SPI holders a "real" part of the business model and significantly increase its value
Don't sell the data - Keep SPI's utility limited to a discount token and other airdrops
author: 0x2DFA2EF642C18F2fc95813a8AD93b45118B25A8A
